service.tut.pori.users.twitter

Class TwitterUserCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.tut.pori.users.twitter.TwitterUserCore

  • public final class TwitterUserCore
extends java.lang.Object
    Twitter User Service core methods. This class emits events of type UserEvent for user account modifications with one of the listed UserEvent.EventType :
    • UserEvent.EventType.USER_AUTHORIZATION_GIVEN for new user account authorizations.
    • UserEvent.EventType.USER_AUTHORIZATION_REVOKED for removed user account authorizations.
